website_summaries.verdict: A good choice if you have small tasks to do and like the idea of the unique handles.
pros: Comfortable T-shaped grips provide extra leverage, esp
Includes storage rack to keep tools organized
cons: With only 10 metric tools, the set has less variety than some other options
These tools also feel less durable than some competitors

customer_reviews.title: Work just fine
customer_reviews.text: These work well and include all the sizes you need for standard bike maintenance. They're not particularly strong and can be bent fairly easily, but should suffice for all but the most ridiculously overtightened hexes (hexen?). The holder looks nice, but is actually quite frustrating to use, as putting the tools back in requires threading them through TWO snug holes. I don't want to do a puzzle, I just want to put my tools away! Complaints aside, these do the job just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: ATD Tools (575 10-Piece Metric T-Handle Hex Key Set
customer_reviews.text: I needed some T-Handle Metric Hex keys for work I do in my workshop, and did not want to spend a fortune for them, so I researched, and found these for a fairly low price. I figured it was worth a shot, and if the tools were not that good, I would not be out that much in the first place for the amount of time I need them. These hex keys come in a nice holder that can be mounted either vertically or horizontally, or you could just put them in a toolbox drawer if you want. They work, and are good enough for what I need them for at a decent price. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Sam-Wise

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of hex keys.  Needs size printed on the top of each hex key.
customer_reviews.text: Great, inexpensive hex key T Handle set. Loss of one star for not having the size of each T-handle printed on the top of the handle. Currently, if the entire assemply is mounted to the wall using the built in screw holes, the printed hex key sizes cannot be seen (faceing downward). Printed size on the top of each handle would obviate this annoying problem.
customer_reviews.author: Drdrdaddeo

customer_reviews.title: Great tools for your shop!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered all three sets, SAE, Metric and Torx. Very solid product. I have use several already and have not had any problems with handles cracking or coming loose. I did drill holes in the mounting brackets so I could screw them to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff - Dallas, Texas

customer_reviews.title: The Right Tool for the Job
customer_reviews.text: Nothing is worse than not having the right tools for the job. Needed a set for the metric stuff. This easily avoids the possibility of stripping out the Metric Allen bolt with a Standard Allen wrench. Have the right Allen Wrench for the job. The Standard Set comes with Orange Handles. Recommend getting the Standard and Metric Set. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Astrid

customer_reviews.title: Good Budget Hex keys
customer_reviews.text: These Hex handles work I've used them for a few projects so far, Build quality is on par with Harbor Freight tools, For those who know what i mean by that. The stand is hard to use as it is made too small and too tight, you can use the stand its just slow going. Overall for the price they are good Just dont expect too much
customer_reviews.author: Mark K

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Decent. They arrived with smallest wrenches already bent and they work alright so far, but don't seem durable. Holder is nice and sturdy and it can be fastened to work bench.
customer_reviews.author: dtman88

customer_reviews.title: Work fine
customer_reviews.text: They seem fine. I haven't had any problem with the keys twisting in the handles. It would have been nice if the handles had been color-coded and clearly marked with the size. I've painted the sizes on the handles.
customer_reviews.author: coffent

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Three of the handles have already broken off while tightening. Did not use a lot of torque
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Buy all three sets
customer_reviews.text: Spend the money and get all three sets you won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Rocky L. Cutler

customer_reviews.title: Not super sturdy, but they're cheap.
customer_reviews.text: The smaller-sized wrenches are not very strong and warped the first time I used them. Otherwise, they're OK.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Seem to be good quality. Added these to my garage for working ...
customer_reviews.text: Seem to be good quality. Added these to my garage for working on firearms. The T handle gives a lot of leverage when working on things.
customer_reviews.author: W. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: If only it were magnetic... still amazing though.
customer_reviews.text: Very useful for custom water cooling, since EKWB loves to use these kinds of tools. But, the big advantage here is the handle. If only it were magnetic... it would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Paulo Santos Alves

customer_reviews.title: Great wrenches
customer_reviews.text: The T handle makes it easier to use the Allen wrenches.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Hatlewick

customer_reviews.title: Good tools.
customer_reviews.text: The tools are great. Just not sure why the mounting holes on the holder are on the bottom instead of on the back of the plate. Will have to drill my own mounting holes to make them easily accessible.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Robinson

customer_reviews.title: T-HANDEL HEX KEY SET- METRIC
customer_reviews.text: All t-handle are straight and in good condition. The newer motorcycles has a lot of hex set screws. I do recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: TN-Will

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this item for a specific job and size ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this item for a specific job and size. It worked properly. For anybody else, be careful and refer to the sizes of each on this set in making sure it fits your needs.
customer_reviews.author: H2Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the price. Convenient base to keep all your hex in one place.
customer_reviews.author: Unraid

customer_reviews.title: Work great. Holder is a bit easy to tip unless ...
customer_reviews.text: Work great. Holder is a bit easy to tip unless you mount it but other than that I love them. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: They work great
customer_reviews.text: Great set of hex key wrenches. I’ve been using them and have no problems with them. Good price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: BrianR

customer_reviews.title: Feels good in you hand
customer_reviews.text: Just does what it's supposed to do. Feels good in you hand, gives you a nice grip, and feels like the will all last a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Mikey B

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: Would prefer not to have the advertising painted all over the front, but otherwise I like them.
customer_reviews.author: C. A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for small jobs. i use mine in my gun room
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: Only needed one size but for just about the same price got this great set!
customer_reviews.author: TiredOldDawg

customer_reviews.title: I like them!
customer_reviews.text: They feel well made. I think they will work out perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lance

customer_reviews.title: I love having these
customer_reviews.text: I love having these, makes working on motorcycles much easier. Minus 1 star due to the sticker showing the sizes being a whole tool off and the 4mm being bent upon delivery
customer_reviews.author: Jarrod

customer_reviews.title: Bendable but get the job done
customer_reviews.text: They are good get the job done but the small one can bend easy if tightening up to much
customer_reviews.author: gustavo

customer_reviews.title: Every size you could possibly need
customer_reviews.text: All sizes in a convenient little case comes in handy
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Junque.
customer_reviews.text: Received it, opened the package, and inspected the tools. The 2mm key is either bent or just inserted into the handle at an angle. I'm not sure which, but it's going back. I'll try a replacement and see if that's any better. If not, I can buy just as crappy a set at Harbor Freight for less. Update: Return postage is on me and there is no option to request a replacement. Crap product, crap vendor. Definitely going to Harbor Freight.
customer_reviews.author: G. Saffer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: just as advertised for a great price and quick delivery!
customer_reviews.author: Tony A

customer_reviews.title: a great set of hex head tools.
customer_reviews.text: hello, with the numerous bathroom fixtures on the market, one would think that all hidden screws would be a common size. trying our sae set of hex tools did not fit correctly. so, a metric set was necessary to keep the handle of the shower in its place. the T grip makes twisting the little screw head tighter easily. a great set of hex head tools.
customer_reviews.author: jnaki

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product but watch out, one of them is starting to rust and I haven't used that one yet. Be sure to rustproof (MMPL or similar) it first thing.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quaility
customer_reviews.text: Although they will work, two of the keys were already bent slightly when they arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Billmore

product_meta.title: ATD Tools (575 10-Piece Metric T-Handle Hex Key Set
product_meta.description: 10 piece Metric T-Handle Hex Key Set features plastic handle grips for comfort and increased turning power. The shafts are made from high quality steel. The set includes: (1) 2mm, (1) 2.5mm, (1) 3mm, (1) 4mm, (1) 4.5mm, (1) 5mm, (1) 5.5mm, (1) 6mm, (1) 8mm and (1) 10mm.
feature_bullets: Shafts are made from high quality steel
Plastic handle grips for comfort and increased turning power

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars117 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
